Sentencas: Among the gas, ion, and electron diffusion processes in solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC) electrodes, it is generally known that ionic conduction has the most impact on their electro-chemical performance.
Titulo: Evaluation of electrochemical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell anode with pillar-based electrolyte structures

Sentencas: Therefore, enhancement of the effective ionic conductivity of electrodes is a useful approach to reduce the overpotential.
Titulo: Evaluation of electrochemical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell anode with pillar-based electrolyte structures

Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) pillars can be effective solutions to enhance the effective ionic conductivity of SOFC anodes.
Titulo: Evaluation of electrochemical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell anode with pillar-based electrolyte structures

Sentencas: In this study, the influence of YSZ pillar structures on the electrochemical performance of SOFC anodes was evaluated by numerical simulation and experiments.
Titulo: Evaluation of electrochemical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell anode with pillar-based electrolyte structures

Sentencas: First, to reveal the electrochemical reaction kinetics of anodes with pillar structures, a three-dimensional electrochemical simulation was conducted by the lattice Boltzmann method.
Titulo: Evaluation of electrochemical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell anode with pillar-based electrolyte structures

Sentencas: The microstructure without pillars obtained by a focused ion beam scanning electron microscopy (FIB-SEM) measurement was used as the reference structure.
Titulo: Evaluation of electrochemical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell anode with pillar-based electrolyte structures

Sentencas: Then, the original structure was replaced with YSZ phase to obtain virtual microstructures with YSZ pillars.
Titulo: Evaluation of electrochemical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell anode with pillar-based electrolyte structures

Sentencas: With YSZ pillars, predicted area specific resistance became smaller than that of the reference structure, in spite of decrease in percolated TPB density.
Titulo: Evaluation of electrochemical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell anode with pillar-based electrolyte structures

Sentencas: The electrochemical potential distribution of oxide ion and charge-transfer currents clearly show increase in the effective ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Evaluation of electrochemical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell anode with pillar-based electrolyte structures

Sentencas: Relationships between overpotential and pillar geometries were parametrically discussed.
Titulo: Evaluation of electrochemical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell anode with pillar-based electrolyte structures

Sentencas: Then, electrochemical performance of Ni-YSZ anode with the YSZ pillar structure formed by modifying the YSZ electrolyte surface was evaluated.
Titulo: Evaluation of electrochemical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell anode with pillar-based electrolyte structures

Sentencas: By sputtering Ni-YSZ on pillar structures, stable electrochemical performance was obtained.
Titulo: Evaluation of electrochemical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell anode with pillar-based electrolyte structures
